subject: Implement layout-aware Looks system for all 12 looks and 28 layouts
body:
- Restructured stylePresets.js with per-layout settings for each Look
- Each Look now defines specific overlay, alignment settings for every layout
- Added activeLayoutPreset tracking to useAdState
- Updated applyStylePreset to use getLookSettingsForLayout helper
- Gradients now intelligently point toward text cells based on layout
- Split layouts get minimal overlay, fullbleed layouts get stronger overlays
